item.description:
On Saturday, October 30th from 4pm until 1am the Cambridge Brewing Company will be hosting their 3rd annual Great Pumpkin Festival, featuring eight CBC pumpkin beers, and a whole patch of guest pumpkin beers from breweries like Elysian, Iron Hill, the Alchemist, Dogfish Head, Wormtown, Allagash, and Martha's Exchange.

In addition, the menu for the evening will feature pumpkin inspired cuisine.

Admission is $10 and includes a limited edition festival glass. No Reservations are available.

I will email my cell number to all "yes" and "maybe" RSVPs the morning of the event. Being a true addict of all things pumpkin, I will likely get there early, but if you can't find us there, you can call or text me.
item.name: The Great Pumpkin, festival, that is
